tool_description:
Use this API to generate SEO optimised Blog Posts for your application. 

Our API uses your generation values to create an SEO optimised blog post that you can embed into any use case you desire. All responses will return keywords you can also embed into your use case to increase domain authority and SEO optimisation.

One possible use case would be to call this API on a scheduled interval to automate blog post creation.

**PRO TIP**: Frequently change the topic and theme values to ensure you...
name: Blog Post Generator API - SEO Optimised with keywords
title: Blog Post Generator API - SEO Optimised with keywords
tool_name: Blog Post Generator API - SEO Optimised with keywords

api_list.name: Generate blog post
api_list.description:
Generates an SEO optimized blog post JSON structure response containing:

- title (the title of the generated blog post)
- blog_post (the content of the blog post)
- keywords (SEO keywords you can use to increase domain authority for your website)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blog-post-generator-api-seo-optimised-with-keywords.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blog-post-generator-api-seo-optimised-with-keywords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://blog-post-generator-api-seo-optimised-with-keywords.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blog-post-generator-api-seo-optimised-with-keywords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
